snippet.title: Express' weekly current events quiz: Pharrell cries, Clinton ducks, and Tom Cruise gets a date
snippet.description: How closely have you been paying attention to the news in the past week? Test your knowledge with our new current events quiz.

snippet.title: Airport security vulnerabilities not uncommon
snippet.description: For all the tens of billions of dollars the nation has spent on screening passengers and their bags, few airports made a comparable investment to secure the airplanes.

snippet.title: Lupita Nyong'o named People's Most Beautiful Woman in the World. Here's how stars typically land the honor.
snippet.description: "There was really no contest this year," People editorial director Jess Cagle said of the stunning 31-year-old Oscar winner.

snippet.title: Jet stowaway at hospital as security issues linger
snippet.description: Surveillance cameras at San Jose International Airport successfully recorded the teenager on the tarmac, climbing up the landing gear of a jet. But in the end, the cameras failed because no one noticed the security breach until the plane — and the boy — landed in Hawaii hours later.

snippet.title: READ IN: Tuesday, April 22, 2014
snippet.description: Biden announces Ukraine help, Boehner puts $300k on TV, McConnell challenger loses staff, Alaska legislature helps Begich

snippet.title: Easter Bunny takes out Racing Presidents
snippet.description: With Rushmores down, Bill cruised to the easy win.
